1: %% Author: jens
    2: %% Created: 7 jan 2013
    3: %% Description: TODO: Add description to hty_formtree_resource_tests
    4: -module(hty_formtree_spaf_SUITE).
    5: 
    6: -export([all/0, single_attr/1, dual_attr/1, nesting/1, no_eq/1, split_attr/1, apor/1]).
    7: 
    8: %% Include files
    9: %%
   10: 
   11: -import(hty_formtree_spaf, [parse/1, parse/2]).
   12: 
   13: %%
   14: %% Exported Functions
   15: %%
   16: all() -> [
   17: 		single_attr,
   18: 		dual_attr,
   19: 		nesting,
   20: 		no_eq,
   21: 		split_attr,
   22: 		apor
   23: ].
   24: 
   25: %%
   26: %% API Functions
   27: %%
   28: single_attr(_C) ->
   29: 	{ok, Q1, []} = parse(<<"apa=lim">>),
   30: 	{ok, _, [{kv, <<"apa">>, <<"lim">>}]} = parse(eos, Q1).
   31: 
   32: dual_attr(_C) ->
   33: 	{ok, Q1, [{kv, <<"apa">>,<<"lim">>}]} = parse(<<"apa=lim&rim=bob">>),
   34: 	{ok, _, [{kv, <<"rim">>,<<"bob">>}]} = parse(eos, Q1).
   35: 
   36: nesting(_C) ->
   37: 	{ok, Q1, []} = parse(<<"[=contactbook">>),
   38: 	{ok, Q2, [{push, <<"contactbook">>}]} = parse(<<"&]=contactbook">>, Q1),
   39: 	{ok, _, [{pop, <<"contactbook">>}]} = parse(eos, Q2).
   40: 
   41: no_eq(_C) ->
   42: 	{ok, Q1, []} = parse(<<"lim">>),
   43: 	{no, missing_eq} = parse(eos, Q1).
   44: 
   45: split_attr(_C) ->
   46: 	{ok, Q1, []} = parse(<<"lim=ko">>),
   47: 	{ok, Q2, []} = parse(<<"rv">>, Q1),
   48: 	{ok, _Q3, [{kv, <<"lim">>, <<"korv">>}]} = parse(eos, Q2).
   49: 
   50: apor(_C) ->
   51: 	Input = <<"[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor">>,
   52: 	Facit = [
   53: 		{push, <<"apor">>},
   54: 		{push, <<"apa">>},
   55: 		{text, <<"orangutang">>},
   56: 		{pop, <<"apa">>},
   57: 		{pop, <<"apor">>}
   58: 	],
   59: 	{ok, Q1, Out} = parse(Input),
   60: 	{ok, _Q2, Out2} = parse(eos, Q1),
   61: 	Facit = Out ++ Out2.
   62: %%
   63: %% Local Functions
   64: %%
